Class KeyFlags

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.bcpg.SignatureSubpacket
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.bcpg.sig.KeyFlags
public class KeyFlags extends SignatureSubpacket
Packet holding the key flag values.
